data.text: Yahweh, listen to me while I plead with you to act justly toward me.
You are the one who is able to declare that I ◄am innocent/have not done anything that was wrong►
You know what I think, even at night;
I have not done like others do;
I have always done what you told me to do [IDM],
O God, I pray to you because you answer me;
Show me that you faithfully love me.
Protect me as people carefully protect their own eyes;
Do not allow wicked people to attack me;
They have hunted/searched for me and found me.
They are like lions [SIM] that are ready to tear apart the animals that they capture;
Yahweh, come and ◄oppose/fight against► my enemies and defeat them!
Yahweh, by your power [MTY] rescue me from those people who are interested only in things here in this world.
Yahweh, because I act righteously, I will some day see you [SYN].
